title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different formats in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values displayed in a dynamic text item and a data/text item are shown in different formats.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
1. Create three items.
2. Set the content of all three items to new Date().
3. Save the items.
4. Preview the items.
5. Observe the formatting of the datetime values in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
